inclusion.criterion: Neoadjuvant chemotherapy planned prior to surgical excision
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Scheduled for target axillary lymph node dissection including the localized lymph node and sentinel lymph node
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Known allergy to bone wax, beeswax or propolis
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 42 year-old postmenopausal woman with a history of breast cancer and lymph node involvement. Currently using multivitamins daily and smokes frequently.
